item.title: Mohawk Industries Shares Drop Over 3% Pre-Market: Here's Why
item.description: Mohawk Industries shares fell 3.8% pre-market to $124 following its third-quarter earnings report, which showed flat adjusted sales. read more

item.title: 'TikTok Needed Shark Tank, Shark Tank Needed TikTok:' Kevin O'Leary Advocates Ownership For US Entrepreneurs In $14 Billion Deal
item.description: Kevin O'Leary is urging that U.S.-based TikTok entrepreneurs receive a stake in the platform's planned $14 billion U.S. sale. read more
